document.full_text: at least 25 people were killed in ivory coast on thursday when forces loyal to incumbent leader laurent gbagbo fired a series of shells into a neighborhood that supports his rival, the u.n. mission said.
document.title: gbagbo forces kill at least 25 in abidjan attacks: u.n.
lines_and_colors: at least 25 people were killed in ivory coast on thursday when forces loyal to incumbent leader laurent gbagbo fired a series of shells into a neighborhood that supports his rival, the u.n. mission said.
